hero.primary_text: Spaces that inspire productivity and creativity
hero.secondary_text: Explore and book offices in your city for meetings and individual work. Discover spaces designed to inspire you and enhance your productivity.

DescriptionSection.heading: We have offices
DescriptionSection.paragraph: No matter how many people you need to accommodate, we have offices that are perfect for any team size, from 2 to 200 people, or more.

FeaturesSection.intro: Discover the unique advantages we offer and understand why our coworking spaces are the best choice for your productivity and professional growth.

features.description1: We offer coworking spaces in strategic locations across LATAM, close to business centers, public transport, and commercial areas.
features.description2: We have a wide variety of offices and meeting rooms that adapt to all needs, whether for quick meetings, individual workdays, or team collaborations.
features.description3: Our spaces are designed to provide a professional environment with all the necessary amenities, including high-speed internet.
features.description4: In addition to workspace, we offer additional services such as reception, technical support, event catering, and more.
features.description5: We offer competitive rates with flexible payment options, no hidden fees. Clients can choose plans tailored to their specific needs and budget.
features.description6: Being part of our coworking spaces provides the opportunity to connect with other professionals, entrepreneurs, and companies.

TestimonialsSection.title: Don't just take our word for it,
TestimonialsSection.description: Hear from our satisfied clients and see how our coworking spaces enhance their work. Their testimonials showcase our quality. Get inspired!

testimonials.description1: I was looking for a quiet place to work on my projects, and Relux's spaces exceeded my expectations. The internet connection is excellent, and the environment is motivating.
testimonials.description2: As a leader of a startup, I needed a flexible space that adapted to my team's changing needs. Relux's locations were perfect to meet my requirements.
testimonials.description3: Coworking spaces have revolutionized the way I work. I found a professional environment full of resources that helped me be more productive and connect with other professionals.

CallToActionSection.heading: Comfortable.
CallToActionSection.paragraph: We are a diverse and passionate team dedicated to designing and executing your vision. We stay agile and enjoy creating great work. Thank you for trusting us and allowing us to be part of your success!
